00029 
00030 int list_line_count (code_list_t *cl)
00031 {
00032    int res = 0;
00033    char *cp = NULL;
00034 
00035    while (cl != NULL)
00036    {
00037       cp = cl->code;
00038       while (*cp != NULL)
00039       {
00040          if (*cp == '\n')
00041             res++;
00042          cp++;
00043       }
00044       cl = cl->next;
00045    }
00046    return res;
00047 }
00048 
00049 char next_char (void)
00050 {
00051    char c;
00052 
00053    /* printf ("next_char\n"); */
00054    c = *(codeptr);
00055    if (c != NULL)
00056       codeptr++;
00057    if (c == NULL)
00058    {
00059       if (clptr->next != NULL)
00060       {
00061          clptr = clptr->next;
00062          codeptr = clptr->code;
00063          c = *(codeptr);
00064          if (c != NULL)
00065             codeptr++;
00066       }
00067       else
00068          return END_OF_LIST;
00069    }
00070    return c;
00071 }

00082 char main (int argc, char *argv [])
00083 {
00084    char **ca = NULL;
00085    FILE *fp = NULL, *ofp = NULL;
00086 
00087    if (argc == 1)
00088    {
00089       printf ("usage: %s [-r] [-b] filename\n", argv[0]);
00090       return 1;
00091    }
00092    get_opts (argc, argv);
00093    filecopy (argv [argc - 1],"bgo.bat");
00094    if (F_optimize () == 0)
00095    {
00096       fprintf (stderr, "optimize failed\n");
00097       if (system ("copy bgo.bat bco.tmp > nul") != 0)
00098          perror ("opt fail");
00099       if (system ("echo rem BAD FILE > bgo.bat") != 0)
00100          perror ("opt fail");
00101       if (system ("echo goto "DUD_FILE_LABEL" >> bgo.bat") != 0)
00102          perror ("opt fail");
00103       if (system ("type bco.tmp >> bgo.bat") != 0)
00104          perror ("opt fail");
00105       if (system ("echo :"DUD_FILE_LABEL">>bgo.bat") != 0)
00106          perror ("opt fail");
00107    }
00108    return 1;
00109 }

00111 void get_opts (int argc, char*argv [])
00112 {
00113    int i;
00114 
00115    for (i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00116    {
00117       if (argv [i][0] == '-')
00118       {
00119          int j;
00120 
00121          for (j = 1; argv [i][j] != NULL; j++) 
00122          {
00123             switch (argv[i][j])
00124             {
00125                case 'r': remove_rems = 1;
00126                          break;
00127                case 'b': remove_blanks = 1;
00128                          break;
00129             }
00130          }
00131       }
00132    }
00133 }

00148 char F_get_labels ()
00149 {
00150    int i;
00151    char text [TEXTLEN];
00152    char *lab_beg, result = 0;
00153    FILE *tmp = NULL, *optofp = NULL;
00154    char line [TEXTLEN] = "";
00155    /* char *lptr = line; */
00156 
00157    tmp = fopen (TMPFNAM, "wt");
00158    if (tmp == NULL)
00159    {
00160       perror ("F_reref");
00161       return 1;
00162    }
00163    optofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "r+t");
00164    if (optofp == NULL)
00165    {
00166       perror ("F_reref");
00167       return 1;
00168    }
00169 
00170    /* printf ("get_labels\n");  */
00171 
00172    sprintf (text, "%%"RET_LABEL"%%");
00173    install_def (text);
00174    for (i = 0; i < sr_call_count && result == 0; i++)
00175    {
00176       sprintf (text, END_SR_PFX"%i", i);
00177       result = install_ref (text);
00178    }
00179    if (line == NULL)
00180    {
00181       perror ("F_get_labels");
00182       return 1;
00183    }
00184    while (fgets (line, TEXTLEN, optofp) != NULL)
00185    {
00186       if (is_label (line))
00187       {
00188          lab_beg = strchr (line, ':');
00189          lab_beg++;
00190          sscanf (lab_beg, "%s", text);
00191          result = install_def (text); 
00192       }
00193       else if (is_branch (line))
00194       {
00195          lab_beg = strstr (line, "goto");
00196          lab_beg += 4;
00197          sscanf (lab_beg, "%s", text);
00198          result = install_ref (text);
00199       }
00200    }
00201    fclose (tmp);
00202    fclose (optofp);
00203    return result;
00204 }
00205 
00206 char install_def (char *str)
00207 {
00208    int ln, i;
00209    label_detail_t *labptr;
00210 
00211    /* printf ("install_def\n");  */
00212    ln = find_label (str); 
00213    if (ln == -1)
00214    {
00215       if (num_labels >= max_labels)
00216       {
00217          labels = (label_detail_t *) \
00218                    realloc (labels, \
00219                      sizeof (label_detail_t) * (max_labels + label_incr));
00220          if (labels == NULL)
00221             return 1;
00222          for (i = max_labels; i < max_labels + label_incr; i++)
00223          {
00224             labels [i].label = NULL;
00225             labels [i].refd = 0;
00226             labels [i].defd = 0;
00227          }
00228          max_labels += label_incr;
00229       }
00230       labptr = labels + num_labels;
00231       labptr->label = (char *)realloc (labptr->label, 
00232                                       (strlen (str) + 1) * sizeof (char));
00233       strcpy (labptr->label, str);
00234       labptr->defd = 1;
00235       labptr->refd = 0;
00236       num_labels++;
00237    }
00238    else if (ln > num_labels - 1)
00239    {
00240       fprintf (stderr, "bad label no\n");
00241       return 1;
00242    }
00243    else
00244       (labels + ln)->defd = 1;
00245    return 0;
00246 }

00292 
00293 int find_label (char *str)
00294 {
00295    int result;
00296 
00297    /* printf ("find_label\n");  */
00298    for (result = 0; result < num_labels; result++)
00299    {
00300       if (strcmp (str, labels [result].label) == 0)
00301          return result;
00302    }
00303    return -1;
00304 }

00306 int F_remove_blanks (void)
00307 {
00308    FILE *tmp = NULL, *oofp = NULL;
00309    char line [TEXTLEN];
00310 
00311    unlink (TMPFNAM);
00312    tmp = fopen (TMPFNAM, "wt");
00313    if (tmp == NULL)
00314    {
00315       perror ("F_reref");
00316       return -1;
00317    }
00318    oofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "rt");
00319    if (oofp == NULL)
00320    {
00321       perror ("F_reref");
00322       return -1;
00323    }
00324    while (fgets (line, TEXTLEN, oofp) != NULL)
00325    {
00326       if (!is_blank (line))
00327          fprintf (tmp, "%s", line);
00328    }
00329    fclose (tmp);
00330    fclose (oofp);
00331    return filecopy (TMPFNAM, "bgo.bat");
00332 }

00381 char next_peep(char peep [PEEPSZ][TEXTLEN], int *end_of_file_head)
00382 {
00383    char line [TEXTLEN];
00384    FILE *oofp = NULL;
00385    int lc = 0;
00386 
00387    oofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "rt");
00388    if (oofp == NULL)
00389    {
00390       perror ("next_peep");
00391       return -1;
00392    }
00393    while ((fgets (line, TEXTLEN, oofp) != NULL) && lc < *end_of_file_head)
00394    {
00395       lc++;
00396    }
00397    *end_of_file_head = lc;
00398    if (fgets (line, TEXTLEN, oofp) != NULL)
00399    {
00400       perror ("next_peep");
00401       fclose (oofp);
00402       return 0;
00403    }
00404    else
00405    {
00406       strcpy (peep[0], peep[1]);
00407       strcpy (peep[1], peep[2]);
00408       strcpy (peep[2],line);
00409    }
00410    fclose (oofp);
00411    return 1;
00412 }
00413 
00414 char F_optimize ()
00415 {
00416    int i, valid_lines = ROWS;
00417    int changed = 1;
00418    FILE *oofp = NULL; 
00419    int lcount = 0;
00420    /* char line [TEXTLEN]; */
00421    int page = 1;
00422    char re_read = 0; /* does the file have to be read inti buf from scratch */
00423 
00424    /* fprintf (stderr, "optimize      ");   */
00425    code_lines = F_line_count ("bgo.bat");
00426    oofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "rt");
00427    strcpy (edit_file_name, "bgo.bat");
00428    if (oofp == NULL)
00429    {
00430       perror ("F_optimize");
00431       return -1;
00432    }
00433    if (F_get_labels () != 0)
00434    {
00435       fprintf (stderr, "get_labels failed\n");
00436       return 1;
00437    }
00438    if (remove_blanks)
00439    {
00440       code_lines = F_remove_blanks ();
00441       if (code_lines == -1)
00442       {
00443          fprintf (stderr, "remove_blanks failed\n");
00444          return 1;
00445       }
00446    }
00447    if (remove_rems)
00448    {
00449       code_lines = F_remove_rems ();
00450       if (code_lines == -1)
00451       {
00452          fprintf (stderr, "remove_rems failed\n");
00453          return 1;
00454       }
00455    }
00456    while (changed || re_read)
00457    {
00458       changed = 0;
00459       re_read = 0;
00460       for (page = 1;
00461            (valid_lines = goto_page (page, oofp)) > 0 && !re_read;
00462            page++)
00463       {
00464          for (i = 0; 
00465               i < min(ROWS, valid_lines) && !re_read; 
00466               i++) 
00467          {
00468             fprintf (stderr, "optimize %4i/%4i p. %2d pass %2d  \r", i, \
00469                                      min(ROWS, valid_lines) , page, lcount); 
00470             if (is_uncond_br (buf [i]) && i + 1 < min(ROWS, valid_lines))
00471             {
00472                changed += dead_code (i, valid_lines, page);
00473                changed += redund_goto (i);
00474             }
00475             else if (is_cond_br (buf [i]) && is_uncond_br (buf [i + 1]) \
00476                                             && i + 2 < min(ROWS, valid_lines))
00477                changed += jump_over_jump (i);
00478             else if (is_label (buf [i]) && i + 1 < min(ROWS, valid_lines))
00479             {
00480                /* eliminate duplicate labels and jumps to jumps */
00481                re_read = lablabjmpjmp (i);
00482             }
00483          }
00484          if (changed && !re_read)
00485          {
00486             write_file (page, valid_lines, oofp);
00487             re_read = 1;
00488          }
00489 
00490       }
00491 
00492       if (remove_blanks)
00493       {
00494          code_lines = F_remove_blanks ();
00495          if (code_lines == -1)
00496          {
00497             fprintf (stderr, "remove_blanks failed\n");
00498             return 1;
00499          }
00500       }
00501          
00502       for (i = 0; i < num_labels; i++)
00503       {
00504          if ((labels [i]).refd == 0)
00505             changed += F_del_unrefd_labs (labels[i].label);
00506       }
00507 
00508       if (changed)
00509       {
00510          num_labels = 0;
00511          if (F_get_labels () != 0)
00512          {
00513             fprintf (stderr, "get_labels failed\n");
00514             return 1;
00515          }
00516          if (check_labels () != 1)
00517          {
00518             fprintf (stderr, "optimize failed at pass %i\n", lcount);
00519             return 1;
00520          }
00521       }
00522       lcount++;
00523       /*
00524       sprintf (tempfile, "opt%i.bat", lcount);
00525       tmpfp = fopen (tempfile, "wt");
00526       print_ca (ca, tmpfp);
00527       fclose (tmpfp);
00528       */
00529       /* fclose (oofp); */
00530    }
00531    return 0;
00532 }
00533 
00534 char F_del_unrefd_labs (char *name)
00535 {
00536    char result = 0;
00537    FILE *tmp = NULL, *oofp = NULL;
00538    char line [TEXTLEN], text [TEXTLEN];
00539 
00540    /* printf ("F_del_unrefd_labs\n");  */
00541    unlink (TMPFNAM);
00542    tmp = fopen (TMPFNAM, "wt");
00543    if (tmp == NULL)
00544    {
00545       perror ("F_unrefd_labs");
00546       return 0;
00547    }
00548    oofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "rt");
00549    if (oofp == NULL)
00550    {
00551       perror ("F_unrefd_labs");
00552       return 0;
00553    }
00554    sprintf (text, ":%s", name);
00555    while (fgets (line, TEXTLEN, oofp) != NULL)
00556    {
00557       if (strstr (line, text) != NULL && is_label (line))
00558          result = 1;
00559       else
00560          fprintf (tmp, "%s", line);
00561    }
00562    fclose (tmp);
00563    fclose (oofp);
00564    code_lines = filecopy (TMPFNAM,"bgo.bat");
00565    return result;
00566 }

00579 
00580 char *find_word (char *str, char *word)
00581 {
00582    char *lp, c, done = 0;
00583 
00584    /* printf ("find_word\n");  */
00585    if (*str == '@')
00586       str++;
00587    while (!done)
00588    {
00589       lp = strstr (str, word);
00590       if (lp == NULL)
00591          return NULL;
00592       c = *(lp + strlen (word));
00593       if (
00594            (lp == str || isspace (*(lp - 1)))
00595            && (isspace (c) || c == NULL)
00596          )
00597          /* return 1; */
00598          return lp;
00599       else if (lp != NULL)
00600       {
00601          str = lp+1;
00602          continue;
00603       }
00604       else
00605          done = 1;
00606    }
00607    return NULL;
00608 }
00609 
00610 char is_branch (char *str)
00611 {
00612    /* printf ("is_branch\n");  */
00613    if ((str = find_word (str, "goto")) != NULL)
00614    {
00615       str += 4;
00616       while (isspace (*str) && *str != NULL)
00617          str++;
00618       if (*str != '%')
00619          return 1;
00620    }
00621    return 0;
00622 }
00623 
00624 char is_rem (char *str)
00625 {
00626    /* printf ("is_rem\n");  */
00627    while (isspace (*str))
00628       str++;
00629    if (strstr (str, "rem") == str)
00630       return 1;
00631    return 0;
00632 }
00633 
00634 char is_blank (char *str)
00635 {
00636    /* printf ("is_blank\n");  */
00637    while (isspace (*str))
00638       str++;
00639    if (*str == NULL)
00640       return 1;
00641    return 0;
00642 }
00643 
00644 char is_uncond_br (char *str)
00645 {
00646    /* printf ("is_uncond_br\n"); */
00647    if (is_branch (str) && (find_word (str, "if") == NULL))
00648       return 1;
00649    return 0;
00650 }
00651 
00652 char is_cond_br (char *str)
00653 {
00654    /* printf ("is_cond_br\n"); */
00655    if (is_branch (str) && (find_word (str, "if") != NULL))
00656       return 1;
00657    return 0;
00658 }
00659 
00660 char is_label (char *str)
00661 {
00662    /* printf ("is_label\n");  */
00663    while (isspace (*str))
00664       str++;
00665    if (*str == ':')
00666       return 1;
00667    return 0;
00668 }

00670 void F_del_line (int line_no)
00671 {
00672    int i;
00673    FILE *tmp = NULL, *oofp = NULL;
00674    char line [TEXTLEN];
00675 
00676    unlink (TMPFNAM);
00677    tmp = fopen (TMPFNAM, "wt");
00678    if (tmp == NULL)
00679    {
00680       perror ("F_del_line");
00681       return;
00682    }
00683    oofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "rt");
00684    if (oofp == NULL)
00685    {
00686       perror ("F_del_line");
00687       return;
00688    }
00689 
00690    /* printf ("F_del_line\n");  */
00691    for (i = 0; i < line_no-1; i++)
00692       fprintf (tmp, "%s", fgets (line, TEXTLEN, oofp));
00693    fgets (line, TEXTLEN, oofp);
00694    while (fgets (line, TEXTLEN, oofp) != NULL)
00695       fprintf (tmp, "%s", line);
00696    fclose (tmp);
00697    fclose (oofp);
00698    code_lines = filecopy (TMPFNAM,"bgo.bat");
00699 }

00701 char *get_label_def (char *str)
00702 {
00703    static char label [TEXTLEN];
00704    char *lp;
00705 
00706    /* printf ("get_label_def\n");  */
00707    lp = strchr (str, ':');
00708    lp++;
00709    sscanf (lp, "%s", label);
00710    return &label [0];
00711 }

00713 char *get_label_ref (char *str)

00716    char *lp;

00718    /* printf ("get_label_ref\n");  */
00719    lp = strstr (str, "goto");

00724 
00725 char negate (char *str)
00726 {
00727    char text [TEXTLEN];
00728    char *lp;
00729 
00730    /* printf ("negate\n");  */
00731    if ((lp = strstr (str, "not")) == NULL)
00732    {
00733       lp = strstr (str, "if");
00734       lp += 2;
00735       /* *(lp - 1) = NULL; */
00736       sprintf (text, "%s%s", "if not", lp);
00737    }
00738    else
00739    { 
00740       lp+=3;
00741       sprintf (text, "%s%s", "if", lp);
00742    }
00743    /* *str = (char *) realloc (*str, sizeof (char) * (strlen (text) + 1)); */
00744    if (*str == NULL)
00745       return 1;
00746    strcpy (str, text);
00747    return 0;
00748 }
00749 
00750 char F_reref_labs (char *newlab, char *oldlab)
00751 {
00752    int i;
00753    char *lp;
00754    /* char text [TEXTLEN]; */
00755    FILE *tmp = NULL, *oofp = NULL;
00756    char line [TEXTLEN];
00757 
00758    /* change references to oldlab to references to newlab */
00759 
00760    /* printf ("F_reref_labs\n");  */
00761    unlink (TMPFNAM);
00762    tmp = fopen (TMPFNAM, "wt");
00763    if (tmp == NULL)
00764    {
00765       perror ("F_reref");
00766       return 1;
00767    }
00768    oofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "rt");
00769    if (oofp == NULL)
00770    {
00771       perror ("F_reref");
00772       return 1;
00773    }
00774    if (newlab == NULL || oldlab == NULL)
00775       return 1;
00776    while (fgets (line, TEXTLEN, oofp) != NULL)
00777    {
00778       if ((lp = find_word (line, oldlab)) != NULL && is_branch (line))
00779       {
00780          *lp = NULL;
00781          fprintf (tmp, "%s%s\n", line, newlab);
00782       }
00783       else
00784          fprintf (tmp, "%s", line);
00785    }
00786    if ((i = find_label (newlab)) != -1)
00787       (labels [i]).refd = 1;
00788    if ((i = find_label (oldlab)) != -1)
00789       (labels [i]).refd = 0;
00790    fclose (tmp);
00791    fclose (oofp);
00792    filecopy (TMPFNAM, "bgo.bat"); 
00793    return 0;
00794 }
00795 
00796 char check_labels (void)
00797 {
00798    int i;
00799    char result = 1;
00800 
00801    for (i = 0; i < max_labels; i++)
00802    {
00803       if (labels[i].refd == 1 && labels[i].defd == 0)
00804       {
00805          fprintf (stderr, "label %s referenced but not defined\n", labels[i].label);
00806          result = 0;
00807       }
00808    }
00809    return result;
00810 }
00811 
00812 int cn_count (code_list_t *code)
00813 {
00814    int result = 0;
00815 
00816    while (code != NULL)
00817    {
00818       result++;
00819       code = code->next;
00820    }
00821 
00822    return result;
00823 }
00824 
00825 char is_esr (char *lab)
00826 {
00827    if (strstr (lab, END_SR_PFX) == NULL)
00828       return 0;
00829    return 1;
00830 }
00831 
00832 char dead_code (int i, int valid_lines, int page)
00833 {
00834    /* dead code elimination */
00835    char result = 0;
00836 
00837    while (!is_label (buf [i+1]) && i + 1 < min(ROWS, valid_lines))
00838    {
00839       fprintf (stderr, "%i/%i p. %d   \r", i, min(ROWS, valid_lines), page); 
00840       if (i+1<min(ROWS, valid_lines))
00841       {
00842          buf [i+1][0] = NULL;
00843          i++;
00844          result = 1;
00845       }
00846       else
00847          break;
00848    }
00849    return result;
00850 }

00852 char redund_goto (int i)
00853 {
00854    /* redundant goto ? */
00855    char lab1 [TEXTLEN], lab2 [TEXTLEN], result = 0;;
00856 
00857    strcpy (lab1, get_label_ref (buf [i]));
00858    strcpy (lab2, get_label_def (buf [i+1]));
00859    if (strcmp (lab1, lab2) == 0)
00860    {
00861       buf [i][0] = NULL;
00862       result = 1;
00863    }
00864    return result;
00865 }
00866 
00867 char jump_over_jump (int i)
00868 {  /* eliminate jumps over jumps */
00869    char lab1 [TEXTLEN], lab2 [TEXTLEN], lab3 [TEXTLEN];
00870    char *lp, newline [TEXTLEN];
00871    char result = 0;
00872 
00873    if (is_label (buf [i+2]))
00874    {
00875       strcpy (lab1, get_label_ref (buf [i]));
00876       strcpy (lab2, get_label_ref (buf [i+1]));
00877       strcpy (lab3, get_label_def (buf [i+2]));
00878       if (strcmp (lab1, lab3) == 0)
00879       {
00880 
00881          lp = strstr (buf [i], "goto");
00882          *lp = NULL;
00883          if (negate (buf [i]) != 0)
00884          {
00885             fprintf (stderr, "negate failed\n");
00886             return 1;
00887          }
00888          sprintf (newline, "%s%s", buf [i], buf [i+1]);
00889          strcpy (buf[i], newline);
00890          buf [i + 1][0] = NULL;
00891          result = 1;
00892       }
00893    }
00894    return result;
00895 }
00896 
00897 char lablabjmpjmp (int i)
00898 {
00899    char lab1 [TEXTLEN] = "", lab2 [TEXTLEN] = "", result = 0;
00900 
00901    strcpy (lab1, get_label_def (buf [i]));
00902    if (is_label (buf [i+1]))
00903    {
00904       /* eliminate duplicate labels */
00905       strcpy (lab2, get_label_def (buf [i+1])); 
00906    }
00907    else if (is_uncond_br (buf [i+1]))
00908    {
00909       /* jump to jump */
00910       strcpy (lab2, get_label_ref (buf [i+1])); 
00911    }
00912    if (lab1[0] != NULL &&  lab2[0] != NULL)
00913       if (!(is_esr (lab1) || is_esr (lab2)))
00914       {
00915          if (F_reref_labs (lab2, lab1) != 0)
00916             return 1;
00917          result = 1;
00918       }
00919    return result;
00920 }
